color_sensor.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 from __future__ import print_function
3 
4 import sys
5 import rospy
6 import cv2
7 import numpy
8 from geometry_msgs.msg import Point
9 from sensor_msgs.msg import Image
10 from cv_bridge import CvBridge, CvBridgeError
11 
12 class image_converter:
13 
14  def __init__(self):
15 
16  self.image_pub = rospy.Publisher("/conveyor/color_sensor",Point,queue_size=10)
17 
18  self.bridge = CvBridge()
19 
20  self.image_sub = rospy.Subscriber("/conveyor/camera/image_raw",Image,self.callback)
21 
22 
23  def callback(self,data):
24  try:
25  cv_image = self.bridge.imgmsg_to_cv2(data, "bgr8")
26  except CvBridgeError as e:
27  print(e)
28 
29  (rows,cols,channels) = cv_image.shape
30 
31  resize_rl=rows/4
32  resize_rr=rows*3/4
33  resize_cl=cols/4
34  resize_cr=cols*3/4
35  cropped = cv_image[resize_rl:resize_rr, resize_cl:resize_cr]
36 
37  avg_color_per_row = numpy.average(cropped, axis=0)
38  avg_color = numpy.average(avg_color_per_row, axis=0)
39  avg_color_rgb=avg_color[::-1]
40 
41  color=Point()
42  color.x=avg_color_rgb[0]
43  color.y=avg_color_rgb[1]
44  color.z=avg_color_rgb[2]
45 
46 
47  self.image_pub.publish(color)
48 
49 
50 def main(args):
51  rospy.init_node('color_sensor', anonymous=True)
52  rospy.loginfo("color_sensor starting")
53  image_converter()
54  rospy.spin()
55 
56 if __name__ == '__main__':
57  main(sys.argv)
